description: A mysterious island where the Straw Hat Pirates' memories are stolen by a seahorse creature. The island contains ancient ruins with writings about the Palace of the Sea God and the legend of a memory-stealing monster.

keyEvents.title: Trio Arrives on the Island
keyEvents.description: Usopp, Sanji, and Chopper arrive on the island via their makeshift raft to search for answers about their lost memories.
keyEvents.significance: The crew's arrival at the location where they will confront the source of the memory theft.

keyEvents.title: Crew Reunion on Island
keyEvents.description: The memory-lost crew members reunite with Nami on the island and begin working together.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the gathering of the scattered Straw Hats in one location.

keyEvents.title: Ancient Writings Discovered
keyEvents.description: Robin discovers and deciphers ancient stone writings that reveal the true nature of the memory thief.
keyEvents.significance: Provides crucial information that advances the plot toward resolution.

statusHistory.reason: Island serves as the setting for the Ocean's Dream Arc

description: A forest on Ocean's Dream Island where Drim confronts and hypnotizes Zoro, turning him against his crewmates.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Hypnotized in Forest
keyEvents.description: Drim approaches Zoro in the forest and uses hypnotic powers to place him under control.
keyEvents.significance: Critical location where Zoro falls under enemy control, creating a major obstacle for the Straw Hats.

statusHistory.reason: Forest is the site of Zoro's hypnosis

description: An ancient palace or temple on Ocean's Dream Island mentioned in ancient writings. According to legend, it houses a monster that feeds on memories to survive. The Straw Hats are directed here by Robin's discovery of ancient texts.

keyEvents.title: Crew Directed to Palace
keyEvents.description: Robin directs the Straw Hats to travel to the Palace of the Sea God based on her findings from ancient writings.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the Palace as the destination where the crew will confront the true memory thief.

statusHistory.reason: Palace is revealed as the location of the final confrontation

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' first ship, a caravel gifted by Kaya. In this episode, it serves as the location where the memory-lost crew members wake up confused.

keyEvents.title: Memory-Lost Trio Awakens
keyEvents.description: Usopp, Chopper, and Sanji wake up on the Going Merry with no memory of who they are or how they got there.
keyEvents.significance: The starting point of the episode's conflict as the affected crew members deal with their amnesia.

keyEvents.title: Raft Construction
keyEvents.description: Usopp builds a raft on the Going Merry to transport himself, Sanji, and Chopper to the island.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates Usopp's resourcefulness even without his memories.

statusHistory.reason: Ship is operational and serving as the Straw Hats' vessel
